indiyawata erehiwa pawathi panduwara wissa tharangawaliya jayagrahanaya kirima hethuwen jathika krikat kandayama sandaha amarikanu dolar 100,000ka mudalak pradanaya kirimata shri lanka krikat aayathanaya thiranaya kara thibenawa.derata athara pawathi tharanga thunakin samanwitha panduwara wissa tharangawaliya tharanga dekata ekak lesa shri lankawa jaya gaththa.

me aakruthi atharin kalani sthupaya ha swarnamali mahathupaya, kumana aakruthiwalata ayath wanne da?pilithura -kalani sthupaya dhanyakara wana athara swarnamali maha sthupaya bubbulakara we.prashnaya - asu maha shrawakayanan wahanse athara maha kathyayana rahathan wahanse pilibandawa pahadili karanna.pilithura - dambaadiwa udenipura dharma pracharaya kale maha kachchayana maha rahathan wahanse wisini.

krikat loka kusalana anusurathawa dina gena shri lanka krikat ithihasaye wadagath sandhisthanayak sanituhan karannata kumara sangakkarage nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka kandayamata haki wu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.shri lanka kandayama labu jayagrahanaya sambandhayen samastha jathiya wenuwen siya suba pathum pirinamamin janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha karayi.shri lanka kandayame jayagrahanaya wenuwen mulu rata eekarashi wi sitiya sema idiriyedith siyalu jayagrahanawalata janatha aashirwadaya nithathin ma himi wana bawa janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.krikat loka kusalana jayagrahanaye abhiyasa dakwa shri lanka kandayamata gaman kirimata haki wima sambandhayen suba pathana janadhipathiwaraya loka kusalana tharagawaliye awasana maha tharagayata sudusukam labimata thewarak ma samath wima bhagyayak bawa da prakasha karayi.

loka sithiyame aluth jathyanthara guwanthotupalak sanituhan karannata apata haki wunu bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya apage daruwan apata ihalin piyasara karanu dakima apa kageth sihinaya bawa prakasha kaleya.mema nawa guwanthotupala wiwrutha kirimath samanga guwane andura durala lanka guwan thalaya eekaloka karannata haki wu bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya apa rate jathyanthara prathirupaya ihala nanwannata memangin haki bawa pawasiya.rata sanwardhanaya karannata jathyantharayen aadhara upakara gannata sidu wana bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya eheth ka bi rata ugasata thiyannata thama sudanam nathi bawa awadharanaya kaleya.nagaraye pahasukam windimin game jiwathwannata gamiyanta awasthawa uda wi athi bawath rate sama palathakatama wihidunu sanwardhanayak sidu karannata rajayata haki wi athi bawath janadhipathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya.janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mahathmiya saha china upa agamathi lo yu ha, agamathi di.
